action.action-desc: Mr. Rosendale introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain facilities in the Sun River Project, Montana, for the purpose of hydroelectric power generation.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Sun River Hydropower Authorization Act.

section.header: Authorization of Sun River Project, Montana

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Commissioner of Reclamation and pursuant to the reclamation laws, may construct, operate, and maintain facilities in the Sun River Project, Montana, for the purpose of hydroelectric power generation.

paragraph.text: be in addition to any other authorizations for the Sun River Project under existing law; and

not limit, restrict, or alter operations of the Sun River Project in a manner that would be adverse to the satisfaction of valid existing water rights or water deliveries to the holder of any valid water service contract.
